title: He's My Wolf
description: I messed up. Big time. I told him I wouldn't leave. I said I would be there for him.But I ran.I ran away from the guy that I...that I love.I'm August Morales. And I don't know who I am anymore...or what I want out of life.Some might say I'm your all-American, blonde hair, blue eye boy. Some would say I'm the most popular guy in school. Others would tell you I'm the best wide receiver, the best player, our school has.Well, they're all wrong. Or at least, I want them to be. I don't want to be the popular guy. I don't want to be the jock. I just want to be Parker's...but I messed up.Now...how do I fix it? How do I prove to him that he should give me another chance? How do I show him that I want to be with him? And I mean...with him.I'm all in Park...all in.With the grey wolf hiding in the shadows, I know he's going to have to kill again. With him being the Alpha of all Alphas, I know that he will have to rule over the Supernatural world. And I want to be by his side, helping him. Supporting him. Because I am all in.I'm all in because...he's my wolf and I'm going to be his mate.He's My Wolf is a mature high school/new adult MM paranormal romance. This book is guy on guy, has foul language and sexual scenes. Recommended for 17+ years. Warning: This book talks about abuse...of all kinds. If you have triggers, do not read. If none of this bothers you...happy reading!
author: S. Schulties
